https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lWD9fkoNQLHAYnkgBXqtHqGXAG1.jpg Saki's father is an alcoholic and her mother is a follower of a new religion. She sees her father's strange behavior and her mother's loneliness. Her family is collapsing, but Saki struggles to look for her future. A Life Turned Upside Down: My Dad's an Alcoholic
